name: cbvalv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))

|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), w0)
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))

|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s1, w1), w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w1, w0))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. See ~ cbvalvw for a version requiring fewer axioms, to be preferred when sufficient. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-10 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 17-Jul-2021.)
